    • 方法详细资料

      • getFonts

        public static Font[] getFonts​(java.lang.String fontFile)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Gets a Font object for a font file in the given path
        参数:
        fontFile - the path to the font file
        返回:
        the Font object representing the font
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if font file does not exist or is invalid

      • getFonts

        public static Font[] getFonts​(java.io.InputStream is)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Gets a Font object for a font file in the InputStream
        参数:
        is - an InputStream containing the font file
        返回:
        the Font object representing the font
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if font file or is invalid

      • getTable

        public static Table getTable​(Font font,
                             int tag)
        Gets the table with the specified tag for the given font
        参数:
        font - the source font
        tag - the tag for the table to return
        返回:
        the specified table for the given font
        抛出:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the font does not contain the table with the specified tag
        另请参阅:
        Tag

      • getCMapTable

        public static CMapTable getCMapTable​(Font font)
        Gets the cmap table for the given font
        参数:
        font - the source font
        返回:
        the cmap table for the given font
        抛出:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the font does not contain a valid cmap table

      • getUCSCMap

        public static CMap getUCSCMap​(Font font)
        Gets either a UCS4 or UCS2 cmap, if available
        参数:
        font - the source font
        返回:
        the UCS4 or UCS2 cmap
        抛出:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if font does not contain a UCS-4 or UCS-2 cmap

      • getLocaTable

        public static LocaTable getLocaTable​(Font font)
        Gets the loca table for the given font
        参数:
        font - the source font
        返回:
        the loca table for the given font
        抛出:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the font does not contain a valid loca table

      • getGlyphTable

        public static GlyphTable getGlyphTable​(Font font)
        Gets the glyph table for the given font
        参数:
        font - the source font
        返回:
        the glyph table for the given font
        抛出:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the font does not contain a valid glyph table

      • getFormattedCodePointString

        public static java.lang.String getFormattedCodePointString​(int codePoint)
        Gets a string version of the code point formatted as "U+hhhh" or "U+hhhhhh"
        参数:
        codePoint - the code point to format
        返回:
        a formatted version of the code point as a string
